sentences.en: a growing demand for high-speed connectivity
sentences.cn: 对高速连接功能日益增长的需求

sentences.en: ADSL is emerging as the technology for home and small - office Internet connectivity.
sentences.cn: ADSL正在作为家庭和小型办公室的Internet连接技术出现.

sentences.en: Display a list of dual - connectivity of the implementation of the original code.
sentences.cn: 展示一张双重连接的名单的实施的原始代码.

sentences.en: In the Add New Item dialog box, select Business Data Connectivity Model.
sentences.cn: 在“添加新项”对话框中, 选择“业务数据连接模型”.
具有因特网连接功能的软件

sentences.en: ISDN connectivity allows computers to communicate over a network.
sentences.cn: 综合业务数字网连接实现了计算机网络通讯。

sentences.en: It helps enable end - to - end connectivity often needed by peer - to - peer applications.
sentences.cn: 它有助于使端对端连通往往需要通过 点对点 的应用.

sentences.en: Its chief responsibility is to ensure reliable end - to - end connectivity.
sentences.cn: 它的主要责任是确保端至端之间的可靠连接.

sentences.en: Manage users, computers, printers, e - mail , connectivity, and your company's internal Web site.
sentences.cn: 管理用户, 计算机, 打印机, 电子邮件, 连接, 以及您的公司的内部网站.

sentences.en: Midrange software has connectivity with database systems and store catalog information.
sentences.cn: 中型软件包可以方便的与数据库系统和商店目录信息连接.

sentences.en: Most of the recent connectivity problems have been resolved.
sentences.cn: 大多数最近的连接问题已得到解决.

sentences.en: Offers complete flexibility by allow connectivity to any standard SQL Database.
sentences.cn: 提供完整的灵活性,允许连接到任何标准来衡量,sql数据库.

sentences.en: Retraining programmers in Front - end graphical user interface ( GUI ) development with database connectivity.
sentences.cn: 开发前端的图形 GUI 和数据库连接.

sentences.en: The chief responsibility of TCP is to ensure reliable end - to - end connectivity.
sentences.cn: TCP主要责任是确保端至端之间的可靠连接.

sentences.en: The network's coverage and connectivity were discussed on base of random placement.
sentences.cn: 主要研究了无线传感器网络节点随机配置的完全覆盖和连通问题.

sentences.en: Through lyrical expressions and enabling connectivity, the world was changed.
sentences.cn: 通过抒情的表达已经使得连接成为可能, 世界杯改变了.

sentences.en: Tourism economy is a sun - rising industry with higher connectivity and higher integration.
sentences.cn: 旅游经济是具有较高关联度和较强综合性的朝阳产业.

words.tran_cn: [计] 连接的；有联系的；连贯的

trans.tran_en: the ability of computers and other electronic equipment to connect with other computers or programs
